title: Perfect chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 skinless chicken leg quarters', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 litres water', '3 cubes chicken stock, crumbled', '1 stick celery, chopped', '3 carrots, chopped', '1 clove roasted garlic, crushed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '350g fine egg noodles']
